subtitle: Delicious, fresh tiger prawns coated in a light batter flavoured with salad onions and deep fried until golden.

method.text: Peel the prawns, leaving the tails intact. De-vein, using the point of a sharp knife or skewer.
Beat together the batter ingredients until well mixed and lump free. Add the prawns to the batter and stir to coat.
Remove the prawns with a slotted spoon and allow to drain, leaving a light coating of batter.
Deep fat fry in batches for 2 min or until golden and cooked through.
Drain immediately on crumpled kitchen paper. Serve with wedges of lemon or lime.

title: Deep fried prawns
